title: kuzhalAl vaiyagattai
sahitya:
kuzhalAl vaiyagattai koLLai koNDa kaNNA kOmaLa shyAmaLa parimaLa maNivaNNA


anupallavi

  azhi taraum viDam tOinda aravan kALinganai aDakki adan mElE arputa naTAm seidAi


caraNam    pANDavar tuyar sErttAi bhAratam mudittu vaittAi paNbuyar aDi avarkkAl pala iDa anubhavittAi
ANDaruL purindiDuvAi aDiyavanAkkiDuvAi aruL jnAna vazhvinil arivaiyum tandiDuvAi
